content: {"name": "The Shepherd Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/\nRegistration is 12:30PM-3:00PM and can come to pick up food the following day.", "email": "", "url": "http://tscenter.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "304 South Pinellas Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Tarpon Springs", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "34689", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 28.1435247, "longitude": -82.757159}, "phones": [{"number": "(727) 939-1400", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social security cards or Birth certificates for every member of the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
